veriloga.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Verilog A language server.

veriloga.verifyOnOpen.description: Run ANTLR verification on all files when opened.

veriloga.disableIndexing.description: Disable automatic indexing when opening a folder or workspace.

veriloga.parallelProcessing.description: The number of files the extension should attempt to process in parallel. Processing consist of opening found files and perform matching to find symbols.

veriloga.forceFastIndexing.description: Force indexing to use fast regular expression parsing.

veriloga.enableIncrementalIndexing.description: Enable incremental indexation as you open files.

veriloga.maxLineCountIndexing.description: When indexing a file, if the line count is larger than this number, fast indexing will be used to improve symbol lookup performance.

veriloga.documentSymbolsPrecision.description:
The level of detail the parser should use when looking for symbols:
  - 'full': detect blocks, ports, parameters, classes, methods, typedefs, defines, labels, instantiations, assertions, and references
  - 'full_no_references': detect blocks, ports, parameters, classes, methods, typedefs, defines, labels, instantiations, and assertions
  - 'declarations': detect blocks, ports, parameters, classes, methods, typedefs, and defines
  - 'fast': detect only common blocks (module, class, interface, package, program) without hierarchy

veriloga.compilerType.description: Select the compiler type from the drop down list.
